|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A, NGV059.001C, 1332, KOREA; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "21514D5500A17A1 Ver:A1", a date code of '''1322''', and lead-free logo, is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos. Two marked antennae are shown - "PCA-2825-A1" is on one, "PCA-2010-" + "A14" is on another.
This [https://fccid.io/KA2IR862LA1/RF-Exposure-Info/RF-Exposure-Info-MPE-pdf-2410188 FCC submission] shows the DIR-862L (AC1600, WL1 MIMO 2x2:2) has the same ID as the DIR-866L (AC1750, WL1 MIMO 3x3:3): RF EXPOSURE REPORT REPORT NO.: SA131227C19E MODEL NO.: DIR-862L, DIR-866L FCC ID: KA2IR862LA1 APPLICANT: D-Link Corporation PRODUCT: Wireless AC1600 Dual Band Gigabit Cloud Router, AC1750 Wi-Fi Router
The DIR-862L main board ''appears'' to be the same used by the [[D-Link DIR-863 rev A1|DIR-863]], and also uses the [[Qualcomm Atheros#SoC|QCA9558 WiSoC]]. There is an unpopulated spot on the board for a NAND Flash IC, and the 863L uses two 16MB flash chips. Another source indicates the DIR-866L FCC ID matches that of the DIR863L.
{{WiFiCert|WFA52509|01/14/2014}}
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:D-Link DIR-862L rev A1 01.jpg| File:D-Link DIR-862L rev A1 02.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== ===Probable used PSUs=== The FCC external photos show the device with either :an '''ADS0271-W''' 120200 or a '''JENTEC''' CG2412-B.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = JENTEC |model = CG2412-B |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.6 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |countrymanuf = China |style=small, horiz. }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = OEM |model = ADS0271-W 120200 |revision = A143L01 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.6 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |e_level=5 |countrymanuf = China |style=small, horiz. }}
